attributes.action: Change the national anthem to "Land of Hope and Glory" or "Rule Britannia".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I concur with the proposal in the petition to change the national anthem to 'Gold' by Spandau Ballet that 'God save the Queen' is both boring and outdated.

However,the suggested change in the aforementioned petition is ludicrous and laughable, so I instead propose a rousing song that would promote solidarity amongst the Queen's subjects - this petition is NOT anti-monarchy.

Therefore I suggest either "Land of Hope and Glory" or "Rule Britannia".

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change the national anthem to "Land of Hope and Glory" or "Rule Britannia".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14001.asp

Prime Minister's Office
